ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
IF( AND( OR( IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "12:00 AM"), IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "01:00 AM"), IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "02:00 AM"), IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "03:00 AM"), IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "04:00 AM"), IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "05:00 AM"), IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "06:00 AM"), IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "07:00 AM"), IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "08:00 AM"), IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "09:00 AM"), IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "10:00 AM"), IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "11:00 AM"), IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "12:00 PM"), IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "01:00 PM"), IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "02:00 PM"), IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "03:00 PM"), IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "04:00 PM"), IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "05:00 PM"), IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "06:00 PM"), IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "07:00 PM"), IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "08:00 PM"), IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "09:00 PM"), IsPickVal( Courier1__Start_Hour__c , "10:00 PM") ) ,
IsPickVal( Courier1__Stop_Hour__c, "" ) ) ,
true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Since you've selected a Start Hour, you must also select a Stop Hour.
